Ecuadorian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated 
    Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Ecuadorian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 55th Anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was held in Quito on August 17.
 At the ceremony Honorary Manager of the "Voluntad" Publishing House of Ecuador Humberto Ortiz was elected adviser to the preparatory committee and Chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea Fabian Guerrero chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee decided to arrange a celebration meeting, film show and other functions in the capital and localities on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.

Greetings to Moldavian President 
    Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Vladimir Woronin, president of Moldova, on August 27 on the occasion of the national day of the country.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop favorably in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished him and his people greater success in the work for the prosperity of their country.

articles.content:
Mindan Denounced
    Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Delegates of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including Han Jong Chi, director of the International and Reunification Department, on August 21 visited the Central Headquarters of the south Korean Residents Association in Japan (Mindan) to present a protest to it for having let loose outbursts slandering the DPRK and taken issue with Chongryon and even adopted what it called "resolution" at a "central meeting to celebrate the liberation day" on August 15, according to Choson Sinbo published in Japan.
 It denounced the Central Headquarters of Mindan for having made reckless remarks going against the trend of the times when all the fellow countrymen were promoting reconciliation and unity and seeking national cooperation after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.    
 It demanded that the Central Headquarters of Mindan immediately rectify its posture against the nation and compatriots going against the aspiration of the fellow countrymen for reunification and national cooperation, well aware of the desire of the entire nation and trend of the development of the times.
